channel.title: Arduino on Ahisahar Pretel Rodríguez

item.title: Arduino Coil Gun
item.description:
Using an Arduino to control and display the different stages between a coil gun, charged and fire. Close the charge stage once the capacitors are charged, display the info at the LCD screen and using a relay control the fire button. Code and instructions available soon on GitHub.

https://github.com/approdriguez/arduino-coil-gun
